name: HMError.Code
desc: Possible error values that can be returned from HomeKit APIs.

items.name: case accessoryIsBlocked
items.desc: An error indicating a blocked accessory.

items.name: case accessoryIsBusy
items.desc: An error indicating the accessory is busy.

items.name: case accessoryIsSuspended
items.desc: The accessory is suspended.

items.name: case accessoryNotReachable
items.desc: An error indicating the accessory is not reachable over the network.

items.name: case accessoryOutOfCompliance
items.desc: An error indicating the accessory is out of compliance.

items.name: case accessoryOutOfResources
items.desc: An error indicating the accessory is out of resources.

items.name: case accessoryPoweredOff
items.desc: An error indicating the accessory is off.

items.name: case accessoryResponseError
items.desc: An error with the accessory’s response.

items.name: case addAccessoryFailed
items.desc: A failed attempt to add an accessory.

items.name: case incompatibleAccessory
items.desc: The accessory is incompatible.

items.name: case actionInAnotherActionSet
items.desc: An attempt to add an action that exists in one action set to another action set.

items.name: case actionSetExecutionFailed
items.desc: An attempt to execute the action set failed.

items.name: case actionSetExecutionInProgress
items.desc: An error indicating the execution of the action set is in progress.

items.name: case actionSetExecutionPartialSuccess
items.desc: An attempt to execute the action set was only partially successful.

items.name: case cannotRemoveBuiltinActionSet
items.desc: An error indicating the built-in action set cannot be removed.

items.name: case noActionsInActionSet
items.desc: An attempt to execute an action set with no actions.

items.name: case noRegisteredActionSets
items.desc: An attempt to activate a trigger with no action sets.

items.name: case invalidAssociatedServiceType
items.desc: An error indicating an invalid service type.

items.name: case objectAlreadyAssociatedToHome
items.desc: An attempt to associate an object with a home when it’s already associated with that home.

items.name: case objectAssociatedToAnotherHome
items.desc: An attempt to associate an object with a home when it’s already associated with another home.

items.name: case objectNotAssociatedToAnyHome
items.desc: An attempt to perform an operation on an object that is not associated to any home.

items.name: case invalidOrMissingAuthorizationData
items.desc: An error indicating the authorization data is invalid or missing.

items.name: case locationForHomeDisabled
items.desc: An error indicating the home’s location is disabled.

items.name: case homeAccessNotAuthorized
items.desc: An error indicating access to the home was not authorized.

items.name: case insufficientPrivileges
items.desc: An error indicating insufficient privileges for the operation.

items.name: case messageAuthenticationFailed
items.desc: A message authentication failure.

items.name: case notAuthorizedForLocationServices
items.desc: An error indicating location services are not authorized.

items.name: case notAuthorizedForMicrophoneAccess
items.desc: An error indicating microphone access is not authorized.

items.name: case notSignedIntoiCloud
items.desc: An error indicating the user is not signed into iCloud.

items.name: case ownershipFailure
items.desc: The ownership code did not match.

items.name: case securityFailure
items.desc: A security failure.

items.name: case bridgedAccessoryNotReachable
items.desc: An error indicating the bridged accessory cannot be reached.

items.name: case cannotRemoveNonBridgeAccessory
items.desc: An attempt to remove a bridged accessory.

items.name: case cannotUnblockNonBridgeAccessory
items.desc: An error indicating a non-bridge accessory cannot be unblocked.

items.name: case readOnlyCharacteristic
items.desc: An attempt to modify a read-only value.

items.name: case writeOnlyCharacteristic
items.desc: An attempt to read from a write-only characteristic.

items.name: case homeWithSimilarNameExists
items.desc: An attempt to assign a home the same name as an existing home.

items.name: case objectWithSimilarNameExists
items.desc: An object with a similar name already exists.

items.name: case objectWithSimilarNameExistsInHome
items.desc: An attempt to give the name of one object to another object in the home.

items.name: case renameWithSimilarName
items.desc: An attempt to rename an object with its current name.

items.name: case accessDenied
items.desc: An error indicating the current user doesn’t have privileges to perform the operation.

items.name: case accessoryCommunicationFailure
items.desc: The accessory failed to communicate.

items.name: case accessoryPairingFailed
items.desc: An attempt to pair with the accessory has failed.

items.name: case accessorySentInvalidResponse
items.desc: An error indicating the accessory sent an invalid response.

items.name: case clientRequestError
items.desc: An error with the client request.

items.name: case communicationFailure
items.desc: A communication failure.

items.name: case dataResetFailure
items.desc: An attempt to reset the data failed.

items.name: case timedOutWaitingForAccessory
items.desc: An accessory did not respond timely.

items.name: case deviceLocked
items.desc: An error indicating the device is locked.

items.name: case accessoryDiscoveryFailed
items.desc: An error indicating accessory discovery failed.

items.name: case alreadyExists
items.desc: An error indicating the container already contains the object you are trying to add.

items.name: case genericError
items.desc: An error that does not have a more specific error code.

items.name: case invalidClass
items.desc: An attempt to use an abstract base class in an operation instead of a concrete subclass.

items.name: case notFound
items.desc: An error indicating the object was not found in the container.

items.name: case notificationAlreadyEnabled
items.desc: An error indicating the notification is already enabled.

items.name: case notificationNotSupported
items.desc: An attempt to register for notifications from an accessory that does not support notifications.

items.name: case operationNotSupported
items.desc: An attempt to use an unsupported operation.

items.name: case unexpectedError
items.desc: An unexpected error.

items.name: case missingEntitlement
items.desc: An error indicating a required entitlement is not available.

items.name: case referToUserManual
items.desc: An error described in the device’s user manual.

items.name: case maximumAccessoriesOfTypeInHome
items.desc: The home already has the maximum number of accessories of the given type.

items.name: case roomForHomeCannotBeInZone
items.desc: An attempt to add the room that represents the entire home to a zone.

items.name: case roomForHomeCannotBeUpdated
items.desc: An attempt to change the room that represents the entire home.

items.name: case noHomeHub
items.desc: An error indicating no home hub found.

items.name: case noCompatibleHomeHub
items.desc: An error indicating no compatible home hub found.

items.name: case cannotActivateTriggerTooFarInFuture
items.desc: An error indicating the trigger cannot be activated because it is set too far in the future.

items.name: case dateMustBeOnSpecifiedBoundaries
items.desc: An error indicating the date is not on the specified boundaries.

items.name: case fireDateInPast
items.desc: An attempt to activate a timer trigger with a date in the past.

items.name: case invalidMessageSize
items.desc: An error indicating an invalid message size.

items.name: case maximumObjectLimitReached
items.desc: An error indicating the maximum object count has been reached.

items.name: case recurrenceTooLarge
items.desc: An attempt to use a recurrence period that is too large.

items.name: case recurrenceTooSmall
items.desc: An error indicating the recurrence interval is too short.

items.name: case recurrenceMustBeOnSpecifiedBoundaries
items.desc: An error indicating the recurrence rule is not on the specified boundaries.

items.name: case enterpriseNetworkNotSupported
items.desc: An enterprise network doesn’t support this accessory.

items.name: case failedToJoinNetwork
items.desc: The accessory failed to join the network.

items.name: case incompatibleNetwork
items.desc: An error indicating an incompatible network.

items.name: case networkUnavailable
items.desc: An error indicating the network is unavailable.

items.name: case wiFiCredentialGenerationFailed
items.desc: WiFi credential generation failed.

items.name: case operationCancelled
items.desc: An error indicating the user canceled the operation.

items.name: case operationInProgress
items.desc: An error indicating the operation is already in progress.

items.name: case operationTimedOut
items.desc: An error indicating the operation timed out.

items.name: case invalidParameter
items.desc: An error indicating the object is invalid for the given operation.

items.name: case missingParameter
items.desc: An error indicating a missing parameter.

items.name: case nilParameter
items.desc: An error indicating that nil was passed for an operation that does not accept nil.

items.name: case unconfiguredParameter
items.desc: An error indicating an unconfigured parameter.

items.name: case readWriteFailure
items.desc: An error indicating a failed read/write operation.

items.name: case readWritePartialSuccess
items.desc: An error indicating a partially successful read/write operation.

items.name: case cloudDataSyncInProgress
items.desc: An error indicating a data synchronization operation is in progress.

items.name: case keychainSyncNotEnabled
items.desc: An error indicating Keychain syncing is not enabled for the user.

items.name: case userDeclinedAddingUser
items.desc: An error indicating the user canceled the add user operation.

items.name: case userDeclinedRemovingUser
items.desc: An error indicating the user canceled the remove user operation.

items.name: case userDeclinedInvite
items.desc: An error indicating the user declined the invitation.

items.name: case userIDNotEmailAddress
items.desc: An error indicating the user’s ID is not a valid email address.

items.name: case userManagementFailed
items.desc: A user management error not covered by the other errors.

items.name: case invalidDataFormatSpecified
items.desc: An error indicating an invalid data format was specified.

items.name: case invalidValueType
items.desc: An attempt to use an invalid value type.

items.name: case nameContainsProhibitedCharacters
items.desc: An attempt to name an object with prohibited characters.

items.name: case nameDoesNotEndWithValidCharacters
items.desc: An error indicating the provided name has invalid characters at the end.

items.name: case nameDoesNotStartWithValidCharacters
items.desc: An attempt to start the name of an object with invalid characters.

items.name: case stringLongerThanMaximum
items.desc: An attempt to use a string longer than the maximum allowed.

items.name: case stringShorterThanMinimum
items.desc: An attempt to use a string shorter than the required minimum.

items.name: case valueHigherThanMaximum
items.desc: An attempt to use a numeric value higher than the specified maximum value.

items.name: case valueLowerThanMinimum
items.desc: An attempt to use a numeric value lower than the specified minimum value.
